definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 2Sa 12:17; Impf. [[אֶבְרֶה]] 2Sa 13:6, 2Sa 13:10 eat bread ([[בְּרוּ־לְכֶם]] 1Sa 17:8 scribal error for [[בחרו]] [[לכם]] 1Ki 18:25 Dr:Sm 107).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[תַּבְרֵנִי]] 2Sa 13:5; Inf. [[לְהַבְרוֹת]] 2Sa 3:35 cause to eat bread.
